title: Escape & other stories
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
description: Episode of Series "Thomas the tank engine and friends. - New series.". Nine more stories from Thomas and his friends, based on the Railway Series by Rev. W. Awdry. 1."All at Sea" - Duck wishes he could sail to faraway lands. 2."One Good Turn" - Bill and Ben have trouble on the turntable. 3. Tender Engines" - Gordon is envious of a two-tender engine. 4."Oliver Owns Up - Oliver learns that trucks can be troublesome. 5."Bulgy" - Bertie is upset by Bulgy, the double-decker bus. 6."Heroes" - Bill and Ben take advice from the trucks - and get into trouble. 7."Percy, James and the Fruitful Day" - James and Percy bicker and end up in a sticky predicament. 8."Thomas and Percy's Christmas Adventure" - Snow leaves the villagers stranded, until Thomas and his friends come to the rescue.
related_objects: Series; S01079; Thomas the tank engine and friends. - New series.; Active; 1991
